title: Alexa+ comes for ChatGPT's web turf
contents: Amazon launched Alexa.com, a web-based interface bringing its AI-powered Alexa+ assistant directly into the chatbot market to compete with ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude. The platform adds agentic capabilities with partnerships from Expedia, Yelp, and Square for reservations and services, while engagement has surged 3-5x since Alexa+ rolled out.

title: 2026년 메모리 시장 “HBM이 이끄는 메모리 슈퍼사이클에 주목”
contents: South Korea's semiconductor market is set to grow 25% in 2026 to approximately $9.75 billion, with memory semiconductors accounting for roughly 30% of that growth, driven by AI infrastructure expansion. SK Hynix is positioned as the biggest beneficiary with its HBM3E and next-generation HBM4 chip leadership, expected to maintain over 50% market share.

title: 팀스파르타, 2025년 AI 오프라인 교육 매출 전년 대비 2.5배 ↑
contents: Korean edtech startup Tumspartner saw its B2B corporate AI training revenue more than double year-over-year in 2025, with 20,000 cumulative students achieving 4.6/5 satisfaction scores. The company shifted focus from theory-based to practical, job-applicable training with hands-on problem-solving and corporate partnerships to place graduates directly.

title: 엔비디아, 차세대 AI 위한 ‘루빈’ 플랫폼 출시…첨단 AI 슈퍼컴퓨터 구현
contents: Nvidia unveiled its Rubin platform at CES 2026, a next-generation AI supercomputer designed to reduce training costs and inference tokens by up to 10x compared to Blackwell. The platform integrates six new AI chips including Vera CPU, Rubin GPU, and DPU technology, with production expected in the second half of 2026.

title: Agibot's tiny, portable humanoid
contents: Chinese robotics startup Agibot unveiled Q1, a 31-inch backpack-sized humanoid with crash-proof joints and zero-code programming that teaches English and dances. The company, which built 5,000 robots and operates three mass-produced humanoid lines, highlighted how China's robotics industry is expanding beyond factories into homes.

title: Meta’s AI chief scientist leaves with parting shots
contents: Meta's departing AI chief scientist Yann LeCun criticized CEO Alexander Wang as inexperienced and admitted Llama 4 benchmarks were manipulated, warning of more departures from the company's AI team. LeCun is launching a new AI startup called AMI with French healthcare AI founder Alex LeBrun as CEO, maintaining that LLMs are a dead end for achieving superintelligence.

title: 노태문 대표, "삼성 모든 제품군·서비스에 AI적용, AI경험 대중화 선도할 것"
contents: Samsung Electronics announced plans to embed AI across all products and services, positioning itself as an AI companion in daily life and democratizing AI experiences. The company introduced Vision AI Companion for TVs, new display and audio technologies including HDR10+ Advanced and Eclipsa Audio, plus a 130-inch Micro RGB TV.
